mapper.insert: insert into POSTADDRESSLOG (SEQNO,GWKH,RECNAME, RECPHONENO, RECPOSTCODE, RECPROVINCENAME, RECCITYNAME, RECAREANAME, DELETE_FLAG, FSDATE, RECTOWNNAME, RECDETAILADDRESS,OPERATOR) values (#{SEQNO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gwkh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rec_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec_phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec_postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec_provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec_cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec_areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{rec_townname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec_detailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
